```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F)
```

## K-means plot

```{r}
params$kmeans_result %>%
        ggplot(aes(!!params$x, !!params$y, colour=.cluster)) +
        geom_point() +
        theme_minimal()
```
